item.title: Climb your Way Up to Senior Ruby Dev with Fabiano Beselga
item.description: Climb your Way Up to Senior Ruby Dev with Fabiano Beselga Fabiano Beselga is a Staff Software Engineer with several years of experience in making a business successful through leadership and technology. Fabiano was the CTO and cofounder of Magnetis, one of the fastest growing Brazilian fintech startups. He was the CTO of Shore, and is currently designing the technical career track as a Staff Engineer at Kaia Health. In this session, we talked about how to Get to Senior as a mid-career Ruby Developer.
